page.title: 20Technology in Aston Homes
page.content: {APPLIANCES NUMBER CARS 368 TELEVISIONS 396 RADIOS 390 FOOD MIXERS 349 WASHING MACHINES 374 DISH WASHERS 17 MICROWAVE OVENS 79 COMPUTERS 163 VIDEO RECORDERS 190 ____________________________________ We counted 396 census forms to find out how many homes owned modern day appliances.The results are shown on the table above. Everyone owned at least one television and more than half the homes owned at least one car, radio, mixer and washing machine. About half the homes owned one or more computer and video.Dish washers and Microwaves are not yet popular.
